title: CRIPPLING Notebook Performance - Single vs Dual Channel Memory
tags: single vs dual channel ram gaming
single vs dual channel ram laptop
dual channel vs single channel ram
single channel vs dual channel ram
ram single channel vs dual channel
description: There are a LOT of manufacturers packing single channel memory into their gaming notebooks without telling buyers.  We decided to take a look at this trend and benchmark identical single vs dual channel setups in a thin and light gaming notebook.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Blade 15 RTX 2060:   Blade 15 RTX 2070:     Blade 15 RTX 2080:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Gigabyte. This video is sponsored by Razer. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #singlevsdualchannelmemory #singlevsdualchannelram #hardwarecanucks
